content: I've been feeling really overwhelmed lately with work and personal life. Everything seems to be piling up and I don't know where to start. I can't sleep properly and I'm constantly worried about failing at everything.

Today was another day where I felt completely empty inside. Nothing brings me joy anymore, not even the things I used to love. I feel like I'm just going through the motions of life without any real purpose or meaning.

I had another nightmare about the accident last night. I can't seem to escape these flashbacks and they're affecting my daily life. I jump at loud noises and avoid certain places that remind me of what happened.
I'm having panic attacks almost every day now. My heart races, I can't breathe, and I feel like I'm going to die. I'm scared to leave my house because I never know when the next attack will happen.

I've been thinking a lot about ending it all lately. The pain feels unbearable and I don't see any way out. I've written letters to my family but I'm scared of what will happen if I actually go through with it.
